properties.name: cors.enable.api-gateway.base-url
properties.description: Enables CORS for API Gateway for requests done through Swagger UI. Used in SpaceshipController with @CrossOrigin(origins = "${cors.enable.api-gateway.base-url}").

properties.name: feign.clients.hangar.name
properties.description: Space Hangar microservice name as provided by Service Discovery. Used by OpenFeign in SpaceshipClient with @FeignClient(name = "${feign.clients.hangar.name}", path = "${feign.clients.hangar.path}").

properties.name: feign.clients.hangar.path
properties.description: Space Hangar microservice API path for Feign client. Used by OpenFeign in SpaceshipClient with @FeignClient(name = "${feign.clients.hangar.name}", path = "${feign.clients.hangar.path}").

properties.name: feign.clients.cantina.name
properties.description: Space Cantina microservice name as provided by Service Discovery. Used by OpenFeign in @FeignClient(name = "${feign.clients.cantina.name}", path = "${feign.clients.cantina.path}").

properties.name: feign.clients.cantina.path
properties.description: Space Cantina microservice API path for Feign client. Used by OpenFeign in @FeignClient(name = "${feign.clients.cantina.name}", path = "${feign.clients.cantina.path}").
